posts.post_title: FS/FT T206 Sovereign, PB, Old Mill backs
posts.post_content:
Hi, looking to trade these for T206s with a stamped back or sell them

Lattimore (Polar Bear) $18.00
Bliss (Polar Bear) $18.00

Could send pic of the backs, just need your email. Thanks

Joe
